entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 6:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
